title: Sattena Thooralum Lyrics Manja Pai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Sattena Thooralum
Singer: Karthik
MOvie: Manja Pai
Music: N.R. Raghunanthan
Lyricist: Yugabharathi

Sattena thooralum kottiyadheppadi
uyir moththamum unnidam ottiyadheppadi.

Adi kadhal vandhal thannaale
iru kannum theeyaai eriyudhadi.
Siru pillai pola naan thulla
en idhayam aanadhu thagudupodi.

Sattena thooralum kottiyadheppadi
uyir moththamum unnidam ottiyadheppadi.

Idhayam enbadhu enakkum unndena
tharindhu kondadhe unnaal thaan.
Edhayum unnidam pagirndhu kollave
virumbuginradhe nenjam thaan.

Nizhal mattum thodarndhu vandha
nilamai maari ponadhe.
Nijam unnai nerungi nirkka
vayadhu kolam podudhe.

Ippadiyum naan aavenaa.
moththamum maari povenaa.
karpanai naan seivenaa
kandapadi poi solvenaa.

Yaarai ketka, kaigal korkka
nee illaamal vazhvenaa.

Sattena thooralum kottiyadheppadi
uyir moththamum unnidam ottiyadheppadi.

Unadhu punnagai urassi selgayil
udhirugindradhe kaayangal.
Unadhu melliya viralgal thottadhum
nigazhugindradhe maayangal.

Edhai kandum bayandhadhillai
idharkku munbu naanumey.
Unai kandu padhattam ondru
varuvadhenna naalumey.

Eththanai pengal nindraalum
en vizhi unnai thaedudhadi.
Thandhadhu podhum endraalum
innamum kadhal ketkudhadi.

Adiye endhan aayul raegai
undha kaigalil odudhadi.

Sattena thooralum kottiyadheppadi
uyir moththamum unnidam ottiyadheppadi.

Adi kadhal vandhal thannaale
iru kannum theeyaai eriyudhadi.
Siru pillai pola naan thulla
en idhayam aanadhu thagudupodi.
